Description: Carvin GK1 Bolt Assembled Guitar Kit Made in the USA with Vintage Guitar Case I believe the body is ash, with natural tung oil finishHard rock maple bolt-on neck....nice and straight with working truss rod6 strings…metalMaple fretboard with 22 jumbo frets....shows no wearBlack inlaysTilt back headstockCarvin silver metal tuners and pegsWilkinson tremolo bridge with tremolo arm It is a single single single pickup configuration Master Volume, Master Tone, 5-way selector switch, and a small toggle switch...all in working conditionHardbody has a small area of belt buckle rash on the back and the front has slight pick marks; no other dings or dents (see pics with pink arrows)White pick guard has a number of fine surface scratchesFolk Art type carving job on back headstock...”Maid in USA 0001”PLEASE DISREGARD THE WHITE SPOTS ON THE PICTURESNO obvious / bad odors Vintage Hardbody Heavy Duty Cardboard Case with Textured Vinyl Covering Dark brown textured vinyl cover has a couple small scuffs on the top. The back has 3 small straight tears...one is ~ 3/8” long and two are ~ about 1” . The metal hardware is good and clean with NO areas of corrosion. All locks work and shut tight. The handle is solid and in good condition, but the rivets on the handle holders are loose. The plush interior is clean with NO obvious odors like smoke, pets, or mildew. Comes with 1 keyStand pictured is not included Shipping InfoGuitar will be packaged in a cardboard guitar box that is 21” x 46” x 10”. It will first be wrapped in garbage bags, then in bubble wrap, or Kraft paper. The remaining areas of the box will be filled with a combination of foam packing, Kraft paper, air bags, and bubble wrap....whichever seems to provide the greatest protection. The exterior of the box will be taped shut with duct tape. If anything arrives damaged during shipment, please keep all the packing materials, then contact me immediately so I can file a claim. Sorry, but because the way the world is working lately, this shipment requires your signature upon delivery. Package will be fully insured for the cost of items purchased. Get it fast. I ship the next day following purchase, sometimes sooner! I don't think there should be any surprises when shopping on ebay. That's why I take lots of pictures and I try to describe every aspect of the item possible. If I do miss something, please let me know right away and know that it is not intentional. THE FINE PRINT Payment via PayPal only. I ship Monday - Friday. I only ship to the address you have registered with your PayPal account (confirmed or not), so make sure your PayPal address is current. Sorry, no shipping to Mexico, Puerto Rico, or Internationally. No returns or exchanges. Returns allowed only if a gross error in the description Previously used packing materials may be used when packing the item. Buy It Now: Requires immediate payment.
